DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: PACHEKOSKI, W. M.;Pachekoski, Wagner Mauricio;PACHEKOSKI, WAGNER MAURÍCIO;PACHEKOSKI, WAGNER M.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduação em Bacharelado em Química pela Universidade Federal do Paraná (1998), mestrado em Ciência e Engenharia dos Materiais pela Universidade Federal de São Carlos (2001) e doutorado em Ciência e Engenharia dos Materiais pela Universidade Federal de São Carlos (2005). Trabalhou por 5 anos em Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento de polímeros biodegradáveis na empresa PHB Industrial S/A e três anos no SENAI -CIMATEC de Salvador como professor. É atualmente professor da Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina, campus Joinville, sendo líder do Grupo de Pesquisa intitulado "Tecnologia de Manufatura e Desenvolvimento de Materiais Avançados". Participa ainda do Grupo de Pesquisa "Thermal Fluid Flow Group". Tem experiência na área de Engenharia de Materiais e Metalúrgica, com ênfase em Polímeros, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: polímero biodegradável, nanocompósitos, blendas poliméricas e compósitos de polímeros com fibras vegetais, possuindo 8 orientações de mestrado concluídas e 40 patentes depositadas na área. Bolsista produtividade CNPq/DT nível E de março de 2012 março 2015. Bolsista produtividade CNPq/DT nível 1D a partir de março de 2016.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: graduate at Bacharelado em Química from Universidade Federal do Paraná (1998), master's at Material and Metallurgical Engineering from Universidade Federal de São Carlos (2001) and ph.d. at Material and Metallurgical Engineering from Universidade Federal de São Carlos (2005). Has experience in Material and Metallurgical Engineering, focusing on Polymers, Applications, acting on the following subjects: polímero biodegradável, poli(hidroxibutirato), phb/pp, aditivos and poli(hidroxibutirato-co-valerato).

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Desenvolvimento de compósitos condutores poliméricos com aplicação em blindagem eletromagnética
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Um dos principais objetivos da pesquisa na indústria automotiva é a busca pela redução de peso, que acaba refletindo na tentativa de substituição de peças metálicas por materiais mais leves, como polímeros. Neste sentido, uma alternativa ao uso de caixas metálicas para a blindagem da parte elétrica em veículos automotores é a procura por novos materiais que possuam propriedades magnéticas e dielétricas adequadas ao uso em absorvedores de radiação eletromagnética. Dentre os materiais em estudo, compósitos formados por polímeros convencionais e materiais condutores à base de carbono têm sido aplicados como centros de absorção de radiação, devido à possibilidade de variação da sua condutividade com a freqüência da radiação das ondas incidentes. As fibras de carbono possuem elevados valores de resistência à tração, módulo de elasticidade extremamente elevado e baixa massa específica, comparadas com outros materiais de engenharia, são utilizadas predominantemente em aplicações críticas envolvendo redução de massa, além de apresentar excelentes propriedades elétricas. Outra metodologia envolve o desenvolvimento de compósitos de poliuretanas com polímeros condutores intrínsecos, como a polianilina. Assim, o objetivo deste trabalho é produzir compósitos condutores, investigando suas propriedades mecânicas e eletrônicas a fim de desenvolver uma composição ideal para a aplicação deste material num sistema eficiente de blindagem eletromagnética.. Situação: Desativado; Natureza: Desenvolvimento.

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: PACHEKOSKI, W. M.;Pachekoski, Wagner Mauricio;PACHEKOSKI, WAGNER MAURÍCIO;PACHEKOSKI, WAGNER M.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Impacto ambiental e sustentabilidade em indústrias automotivas na região de Salvador/BA
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Nos últimos anos, eventos climáticos extremos tornaram a questão do desenvolvimento sustentável um assunto de discussão freqüente e pauta central de inúmeros encontros globais. A preocupação com a garantia de perpetuação da vida na Terra deve ser de todos, mas nas empresas as exigências são maiores, já que as indústrias são responsáveis pela maior parte do consumo dos recursos naturais. Comprometer-se com o meio ambiente é, assim, uma obrigação de todas as empresas que queiram sobreviver na economia globalizada. Para enfrentar estes novos desafios de produzir mais com menos, as empresas devem adotar metodologias de gestão que possam contribuir para a sustentabilidade de seus processos. Neste estudo analítico, elaboramos uma proposta de modificação da metodologia FMEA Failure Mode and Effects Analysis - Análise do Modo e Efeitos de Falha para contemplar conceitos de proteção ao meio ambiente para sua aplicação no processo manutenção industrial, com foco em uma produção mais limpa, principalmente impedindo a quebra de máquinas que possam gerar impactos ambientais de qualquer espécie ou então minimizar os efeitos no meio ambiente quando da ocorrência de falhas. Com isso poderemos avaliar o processo manutenção industrial, também sob a ótica de proteção ao meio ambiente, utilizando a metodologia FMEA adaptada a esta nova realidade de desenvolvimento sustentável..

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudo de materiais compósitos e nanocompósitos
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O desenvolvimento da compósitos e nanocompósitos a tem sido apontado como uma nova revolução tecnológica, que, em ritmo acelerado de crescimento, está revolucionando a aplicação de diversos produtos e têm levado a eventos ainda não compreendidos plenamente. O objetivo desta linha de pesquisa é desenvolver e estudar novos materiais baseados nesta tecnologia, bem como estudar o seu comportamento, visando o aprimoramento de propriedades.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudo de modificadores em matrizes poliméricas.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto de pesquisa propõe um plano de estudos da modificação de diferentes polímeros e as consequências em suas propriedades físico-químicas. Estas modificações poderão ocorrer através do acréscimo de aditivos, da mistura de outros polímeros, de reações que possam favorecer as propriedades destes materiais ou da adição de cargas e nanocargas. Para tal, serão estudadas blendas poliméricas com e sem o uso de agentes compatibilizantes, novos materiais de reforço e novos aditivos ou modificadores. As diferentes composições serão preparadas em reômetro Haake ou extrusora dupla rosca, sendo suas características mecânicas, térmicas e avaliadas na sequência

REGISTRO-OU-PATENTE.TITULO-PATENTE: EP1987102A1 - Composition for preparing a biodegradable polyurethane- based foam and a biodegradable polyurethane foam

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Composition for preparing a biodegradable polyurethane- based foam and a biodegradable polyurethane foam, comprising mixtures based on poly(hydroxybutyrate) polymer, polyols of renewable source, isocyanates and additives, with the object of preparing biodegradable polyurethane foams. In the process, the poly(hydroxybutyrate) plus the polyol, the isocyanate and the additives are previously mixed in specific mixers; once the homogenization is reached, the mixture is poured in mold for growing. After curing, the resulting product presents foam characteristics, with its density, toughness and cell size varying according to the proportion of the reagents and allowing the manufacture of several products.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The present invention refers to an environmentally degradable polymeric blend, comprising biodegradable polymers defined by polyhydroxybutyrate (PHB) or copolymers thereof and Polycaprolactone (PCL) and, optionally, at least one additive defined by a filler, nucleant, thermal stabilizer, processing aid, with the purpose of preparing an environmentally degradable polymeric blend. According to the production process described herein, the blend resulting from the mixture of the biodegradable polymers, PHB and PCL, and at least one additive, can be utilized in the manufacture of injected food packages, injected packages for cosmetics, tubes, technical pieces and several injected products.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The present invention refers to a polymeric blend for the preparation of environmentally degradable materials, said blend comprising biodegradable polymers, polyhydroxybutyrate - PHB or copolymers thereof and poly (butylene adipate/butylene terephthalate) aliphatic-aromatic copolyester and at least one additive. The present invention further refers to the process for obtaining said blend, by applying the extrusion technique to obtain an adequate morphology in the distribution, dispersion and interaction of the polymers, so as to obtain compatible polymeric blends, allowing the granules of the produced polymeric blends to be utilized to manufacture several injection molded products.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The present invention refers to a polymeric blend for the preparation of environmentally degradable materials, said blend comprising biodegradable polymers, polyhydroxybutyrate - PHB or copolymers thereof and poly (butylene adipate/butylene terephthalate) aliphatic-aromatic copolyester and at least one additive. The present invention further refers to the process for obtaining said blend, by applying the extrusion technique to obtain an adequate morphology in the distribution, dispersion and interaction of the polymers, so as to obtain compatible polymeric blends, allowing the granules of the produced polymeric blends to be utilized to manufacture several injection molded products.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PATENTE.TITULO: WO2007095710 - Composition for preparing a degradable polyol polyester, process for obtaining a polyol polyester, an elastomer, foams, paints and adhesives, and degradable polyol polyester foam.

REGISTRO-OU-PATENTE.TITULO-PATENTE: WO2007095710 - Composition for preparing a degradable polyol polyester, process for obtaining a polyol polyester, an elastomer, foams, paints and adhesives, and degradable polyol polyester foam.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The present invention refers to a composition of mixtures based on poly(hydroxybutyrate) polymer and vegetable oils, with the object of preparing a degradable polyol polyester. In the process, the poly(hydroxybutyrate) plus the vegetable oil react under heating, producing the polyol polyester, which once purified can be utilized in applications similar to those of the traditional polyurethane: adhesives, foams, elastomers and paints.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The present invention refers to a composition of mixtures based on poly(hydroxybutyrate) polymer and vegetable oils, with the object of preparing a degradable polyol polyester. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The present invention refers to a polymeric composition prepared from a biodegradable polymer defined by polyhydroxybutyrate (PHB) or copolymers thereof, and at least one other biodegradable polymer, such as polycaprolactone (PCL) and poly (lactic acid) (PLA), so as to alter its structure, and further at least one additive of the type of natural filler and natural fibers, and, optionally, nucleant, thermal stabilizer, processing aid, with the object of preparing an environmentally degradable material. According to the production process described herein, the composition resulting from the mixture of the modified biodegradable polymer and additives can be utilized in the manufacture of injected packages for food products, injected packages for cosmetics, tubes, technical pieces and several injected products.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The present invention refers to a polymeric composition prepared from a biodegradable polymer defined by polyhydroxybutyrate (PHB) or copolymers thereof, and at least one other biodegradable polymer, such as polycaprolactone (PCL) and poly (lactic acid) (PLA), so as to alter its structure, and further at least one additive of the type of natural filler and natural fibers, and, optionally, nucleant, thermal stabilizer, processing aid, with the object of preparing an environmentally degradable material. According to the production process described herein, the composition resulting from the mixture of the modified biodegradable polymer and additives can be utilized in the manufacture of injected packages for food products, injected packages for cosmetics, tubes, technical pieces and several injected products.

REGISTRO-OU-PATENTE.TITULO-PATENTE: WO2007095711 - Biodegradable polimeric composition and method for producing a biodegradable polimeric composition.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Biodegradable polymeric composition and method for producing a biodegradable polymeric composition, comprising poly(hydroxybutyrate) or copolymers thereof, a plasticizer obtained from a renewable source, a nucleant additive, a flow aid additive, and a thermal stabilizer additive. The process of obtention comprises the steps of mixing to a load of PHB or PHBV in powder, from about 2% to 30% of a plasticizer based on vegetable oils of natural origin and fatty acids of animal and vegetable origin, distilled and hydrogenated; mixing to the biopolymer already containing the plasticizer a thermal stabilizer additive, a nucleant additive; and a flow aid additive; and extruding the composition obtained in the previous step to promote, in the melt state, the incorporation of the additives in the matrix of PHB or PHBV and its subsequent granulation.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Biodegradable polymeric composition and method for producing a biodegradable polymeric composition, comprising poly(hydroxybutyrate) or copolymers thereof, a plasticizer obtained from a renewable source, a nucleant additive, a flow aid additive, and a thermal stabilizer additive. The process of obtention comprises the steps of mixing to a load of PHB or PHBV in powder, from about 2% to 30% of a plasticizer based on vegetable oils of natural origin and fatty acids of animal and vegetable origin, distilled and hydrogenated; mixing to the biopolymer already containing the plasticizer a thermal stabilizer additive, a nucleant additive; and a flow aid additive; and extruding the composition obtained in the previous step to promote, in the melt state, the incorporation of the additives in the matrix of PHB or PHBV and its subsequent granulation.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Biodegradable polymeric composition and method for producing a biodegradable polymeric composition, comprising poly(hydroxybutyrate) or copolymers thereof, a plasticizer obtained from a renewable source, a nucleant additive, a flow aid additive, and a thermal stabilizer additive. The process of obtention comprises the steps of mixing to a load of PHB or PHBV in powder, from about 2% to 30% of a plasticizer based on vegetable oils of natural origin and fatty acids of animal and vegetable origin, distilled and hydrogenated; mixing to the biopolymer already containing the plasticizer a thermal stabilizer additive, a nucleant additive; and a flow aid additive; and extruding the composition obtained in the previous step to promote, in the melt state, the incorporation of the additives in the matrix of PHB or PHBV and its subsequent granulation.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Biodegradable polymeric composition and method for producing a biodegradable polymeric composition, comprising poly(hydroxybutyrate) or copolymers thereof, a plasticizer obtained from a renewable source, a nucleant additive, a flow aid additive, and a thermal stabilizer additive. The process of obtention comprises the steps of mixing to a load of PHB or PHBV in powder, from about 2% to 30% of a plasticizer based on vegetable oils of natural origin and fatty acids of animal and vegetable origin, distilled and hydrogenated; mixing to the biopolymer already containing the plasticizer a thermal stabilizer additive, a nucleant additive; and a flow aid additive; and extruding the composition obtained in the previous step to promote, in the melt state, the incorporation of the additives in the matrix of PHB or PHBV and its subsequent granulation.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PATENTE.TITULO: WO2007090255 - Polymeric implant and a process for obtaining a polymeric implant
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PATENTE.TITULO-INGLES: WO2007090255 - Polymeric implant and a process for obtaining a polymeric implant

REGISTRO-OU-PATENTE.TITULO-PATENTE: WO2007090255 - Polymeric implant and a process for obtaining a polymeric implant

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The polymeric implant is obtained from a renewable source, comprising a body (10) formed by at least one biodegradable polymer selected from the group consisting of polyhydroxyalcanoates (PHAs) and copolymers thereof, said body (10) incorporating, in its micro-structure, an active ingredient in a sufficient quantity to control at least one oestrus cycle of mammal animals. The invention further refers to a process for obtaining a polymeric implant comprising the steps of: mixing progesterone or progestogen, at least one polymer of the group of PHAs, one polymeric additive defined by poly(e-caprolactone), and at least one dispersant additive and/or solvent, to obtain a colloidal solution; evaporating the solvent of the colloidal solution, and forming a paste with the components dispersed therein; drying the paste to remove the residual solvents and control the granulometry of the polymer composite; extruding the polymeric composite and moulding the latter in an implant body (10).
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The polymeric implant is obtained from a renewable source, comprising a body (10) formed by at least one biodegradable polymer selected from the group consisting of polyhydroxyalcanoates (PHAs) and copolymers thereof, said body (10) incorporating, in its micro-structure, an active ingredient in a sufficient quantity to control at least one oestrus cycle of mammal animals. The invention further refers to a process for obtaining a polymeric implant comprising the steps of: mixing progesterone or progestogen, at least one polymer of the group of PHAs, one polymeric additive defined by poly(e-caprolactone), and at least one dispersant additive and/or solvent, to obtain a colloidal solution; evaporating the solvent of the colloidal solution, and forming a paste with the components dispersed therein; drying the paste to remove the residual solvents and control the granulometry of the polymer composite; extruding the polymeric composite and moulding the latter in an implant body (10).

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PATENTE.TITULO: WO2006105629 - Seedling recipient, process for producing a seedling recipient and process for seedling growth and planting .
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-PATENTE.TITULO-INGLES: WO2006105629 - Seedling recipient, process for producing a seedling recipient and process for seedling growth and planting .

REGISTRO-OU-PATENTE.TITULO-PATENTE: WO2006105629 - Seedling recipient, process for producing a seedling recipient and process for seedling growth and planting .

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A seedling recipient, a process for producing a seedling recipient and a process for seedling growth and planting, comprising a tubular body (10) with a closed end (11) and an open end (12) and which is dimensioned to contain a culture medium (MC) for retention and growth of the seedling, said tubular body (10) being formed of a biodegradable polymer, in which the density and structure of its walls are dimensioned to lead to a recipient degradation rate compatible with the expected root development of the seedling and with the environmental characteristics of the planting field. Said process for producing a seedling recipient comprises the steps of: predetermining the density and structure of the walls of the tubular body (10) according to a desired degradation rate compatible with the expected root development of the seedling and with the environmental characteristics of the planting field; and molding the tubular body (10) from the biodegradable polymer.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: A seedling recipient, a process for producing a seedling recipient and a process for seedling growth and planting, comprising a tubular body (10) with a closed end (11) and an open end (12) and which is dimensioned to contain a culture medium (MC) for retention and growth of the seedling, said tubular body (10) being formed of a biodegradable polymer, in which the density and structure of its walls are dimensioned to lead to a recipient degradation rate compatible with the expected root development of the seedling and with the environmental characteristics of the planting field. Said process for producing a seedling recipient comprises the steps of: predetermining the density and structure of the walls of the tubular body (10) according to a desired degradation rate compatible with the expected root development of the seedling and with the environmental characteristics of the planting field; and molding the tubular body (10) from the biodegradable polymer.
